A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I thought the latest Star Wars movie was a lot of fun. If you don't dig too deep and obsess over details. There were a few things that could have been done better\, and it ran a little too long\, but the character development was pretty solid. I hope that some of the \"reveals\" in the movie turn out to be feints\, much like Obi Wan telling Luke that his father was dead in the original Star Wars: A New Hope. But time will tell how it holds up.
